body:
Basic screens spawned from main (top center):

![Activities](http://tsicilian.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/cloid-activities16.png)



Uploading images from Android Gallery:

![Upload](http://tsicilian.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/cloid-uploadactivity3.png)



Browsing the Azure Cloud Blob storage:

![Browse](http://tsicilian.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/cloid-browseactivity-set3.png)



Downloading Images from Blob storage to the Gallery (saved on SD card):

![Download](http://tsicilian.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/cloid-downloadactivity-set3.png)



Deleting content stored in the Cloud from the Android handset:

![Delete](http://tsicilian.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/cloid-deleteactivity-set3.png)



Push Notifications (GCM):

![Push](http://tsicilian.files.wordpress.com/2012/08/cloid-push.png)



Nomad-9.
[Blog](http://tsicilian.wordpress.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Cloid
